page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES AT OVERBURY
page.content: In the school playground some of the games we like playing are :{Stuck In {The Mud}-We choose somebody to be on,then they have to chase you and if you are tagged (touched with a hand )you stand still with legs wide apart.If somebody goes under your legs you are free to run off. {Tally Ho}-We choose somebody to be on. The other players stand by a wall at one side of the playground.The person who is on chooses another player to try to run across the playground to the opposite side.If they are caught,they then have to be on with the person who called them.If they get to the other side they shout{"Tally {Ho"}and all the other people try to run across the playground without being caught.The game then continues in the opposite direction.
